name: Wipe Out!
description:
Have fun snowboarding down a hill, but watch out for the trees and don't fall of the edge!

Controls

Arrow Keys or W-A-S-D for movement

*Sound Included

Bugs

*Current bugs when falling off edge or reaching end of slope.

Credits

Audio:

LightspeedLife

 

Visual Assets: 

"Bodyboard" by THE CLOUD CREATOR

"Conifers [BOTD]" by FORST

"Snow Mountain" by SVCHOST74

Jam Information

Weekly Game Jam - Week 167, Theme: 'Glide'
